mapper.select: SELECT log.ALLOTTIME, log.STAFFID, log.STAFFNAME, log.KZNUM, log.KZID, info.CHANNELID, info.SOURCEID FROM hm_crm_allot_log_1314 log LEFT JOIN hm_crm_client_info_1314 info ON log.KZID = info.KZID AND info.COMPANYID = 1314 WHERE log.COMPANYID = #{companyId} AND log.STAFFID = #{staffId} AND log.STATUSID = 0 AND log.ALLOTTIME > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(SYSDATE())) ORDER BY log.ALLOTTIME DESC
